SELECT DEFICIENCY_CODE_ID, DEFICIENCY_CODE_NAME, DEFECTIVE_ITEM, DEFICIENCY_CATEGORY_ID,
DELETE_FLAG, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, CREATE_MS_USER_ID, UPDATE_MS_USER_ID
FROM MS_DEFICIENCY_CODE
WHERE DELETE_FLAG = False

UPDATE MS_DEFICIENCY_CODE SET DEFICIENCY_CODE_NAME = :DEFICIENCY_CODE_NAME , DEFECTIVE_ITEM = :DEFECTIVE_ITEM , DEFICIENCY_CATEGORY_ID = :DEFICIENCY_CATEGORY_ID, DELETE_FLAG = :DELETE_FLAG , UPDATE_MS_USER_ID = :UPDATE_MS_USER_ID
